sections.title: Cost Changes
sections.description: The method of purchasing increased damage on an Ability has become much less of a hassle. Added explicit definition of rolling for Healing. Origin Abilities may now contain 1 Enhancement, not affecting class Abilities' Enhancement limits. Duration costs have lessened and become more reliant on Enhancements, representing multiplication of Abilities' base effect. Updated how Concentration reduces Duration Cost. Specified only 1 Narrative Weight is applicable per Ability, you need not apply multiple. Updated Caveat costs.

sections.title: New Perks
sections.description: Added new Perks to the Volatility page, giving players more options for customizing their Volatility Pools.
